cause.description: United for Peace and Justice is the largest antiwar coalition in the U.S., with over 1,400 local, regional and national groups working to end the war and occupation in Iraq. The coalition has member groups nationwide, from Alaskans for Peace to the South Florida Peace and Justice Network, and has organized the largest demonstrations against the war. To contribute to our work, please visit our online donation page: www.unitedforpeace.org/donate 1. The war and occupation of Iraq must end immediately. 2. Bring all the troops and military contractors home now, and take care of them when they get here. 3. Work with other nations to secure a just peace for all countries in the Middle East. 4. Appropriate massive funding for Iraqi-led reconstruction of their country.
cause.mission: End the war and occupation in Iraq, and prevent future wars of aggression.
cause.name: United for Peace and Justice
